titles.title: To permit duty free treatment for certain structures, parts, and components used in the Gemini Telescope Project.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/22/1996--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to admit duty free, after March 31, 1997, certain structures, parts, and components used in the Gemini Telescopes Project, in Mauna Kea, Hawaii.
